title: 【生存/冒险】THE APOCALYPSE - EP 1: ATTACK AND DEFEND|世界末日-1:攻打和防御
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:13 编辑 




简介 InfoThe zombie apocalypse broke out, and small communities of survivors has risen from the darkness. But now The Republic Nation must battle The Evolved Federation in order to restore society and rebuild civilization.How far are you willing to go to save your loved ones?NOTE: You do NOT have to play the story in this map. This can also be played as a normal survival map. It's just recommended to follow the story.The Apocalypse Episode 2: "Rise and Fall" will be releasing soon!僵尸末日到了，所有小团体的幸存者从黑暗中走出。但现在共 和 国必须跟逐渐发展的联合会来一场战争，这样才可以重获文明。你还有多久才来拯救你的爱人？注意：你不需要玩次地图的剧情，你可以把它看作是正常的生存地图。但是我推荐你可以玩一下剧情。《世界末日-2崛起与堕落》将很快推出！
